title: Which is the first electronic car? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are multiple electronics systems in each car and all were developed separately in separate eras. The development of semiconductors after WWII really accelerated its growth in vehicles. the most demanding electronic part of an automobile is the engine control unit (ECU). The first use of electronics in a car was by Volkswagen in 1968 for EFI (electronic fuel injection) for engine control. It was called the ECU computer, or the Engine Control Unit and was copied by all other auto manufactures. This started an electronic war to develop the car with the most advanced electronics which rages on even today in the areas of fuel efficiency, safety, assisted and autonomous driving.
